Text: Could You PLEASE upload Asphalt 6: Adrenaline (Mac App Store Version)
thanks so much dude!!!! viva el rock!

Awesome app! Fast download, even for a really bad connection.
Can we get the updated version (2.1.1)?

If you want the latest version of Capo, download and install this one, then choose "Check for Updates..." from the Capo menu. Let the program update itself, then use the keygen included with this torrent to patch the updated app. The patch still works even after updating it to 2.1.2.
